attributes.action: make it compulsory for everyone who has just passed their driving test to take their advanced driving test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year more and more motorists are having accidents in the first year after they have pased their driving test, sometimes with fatal cosequences, by making it compulsory for everyone to pass the advanced driving test before they are allowed a full licence will cut these figures drastically and help the pockets of young drivers who get stung by huge insurance premiums.
